subject: Does MockEJB Support Local EJBs IF any what are the constraints?
msgSnippet: Hello Guys, How does the MockEJB framework support the Local EJBs? Are there any constraints there? Also does MockEJB framework depend on JDK Version? Thanks
messageBody:
Hello Guys,

How does the MockEJB framework support the Local EJBs? Are there any
constraints there?

Also does MockEJB framework depend on JDK Version?

Thanks in advance.

Thanks,
Ashfaq
